title: Realm of Legends Action RPG - Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Create character creation system with race and class selection
acceptanceCriteria: User can select from three races: Human, Elf, Dwarf
User can select from three classes: Warrior, Mage, Ranger
Each race/class combination has distinct base stats
Character data is persisted in backend

file_operations.description: Create character creation interface with race selection (Human, Elf, Dwarf) and class selection (Warrior, Mage, Ranger). Display race illustrations from frontend/public/assets/generated/race-human.dim_400x400.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/race-elf.dim_400x400.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/race-dwarf.dim_400x400.png. Display class icons from frontend/public/assets/generated/class-warrior.dim_256x256.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/class-mage.dim_256x256.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/class-ranger.dim_256x256.png. Show stat modifiers for each combination. Call backend createCharacter method with selected options.
Create mutation hook for character creation that calls backend createCharacter method with name, race, class, and appearance parameters. Handle success and error states.

Create route component that renders CharacterCreation component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated before allowing character creation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add character-creation route to router configuration to make the character creation page navigable.

acceptanceCriteria: User can customize character appearance with multiple options
Appearance choices are reflected in character preview
Customization data is saved with character profile

file_operations.description: Create appearance customization interface with options for hair, skin tone, and equipment appearance. Provide visual preview of customization choices. Include this component within CharacterCreation workflow.
Integrate AppearanceCustomizer component into character creation flow. Pass appearance data to backend createCharacter call.

requirements.summary: Build skill tree and ability system
acceptanceCriteria: Each class has unique skill tree with multiple branches
Players can allocate skill points to unlock abilities
Skill allocation is stored and retrievable from backend

file_operations.description: Create skill tree UI component showing class-specific abilities in branching structure. Allow players to allocate skill points to unlock abilities. Display available and unlocked abilities with visual indicators.
Create mutation hook that calls backend updateCharacterSkills method with characterId, skillPoints, and abilities array.

Create route component for skill tree page that renders SkillTree component for specific character. Use the authorization component to ensure user owns the character. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add skill-tree route with dynamic characterId parameter to router configuration.

requirements.summary: Create 3D open world environment using React Three Fiber
acceptanceCriteria: 3D world rendered using React Three Fiber
At least four distinct environment types are visually represented
Player character can move through the world
Camera follows player movement

file_operations.description: Create 3D game world using React Three Fiber with Canvas component. Implement four biomes (forest, mountain, dungeon, city) using environment backgrounds from frontend/public/assets/generated/forest-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/mountain-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/dungeon-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/city-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as textures. Include player character mesh with movement controls and camera follow system. This is a 3D game.
Create 3D player character component with mesh geometry, movement logic using keyboard controls, and position state management for the 3D game world.
Create camera controller component that follows player position in 3D space with smooth transitions.

Create main game route that renders World3D component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated before accessing the game. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add game route to router configuration and include navigation link in main layout.

acceptanceCriteria: Smooth day-night transitions with realistic lighting changes
Time of day affects ambient lighting and shadows
Current time state is visible to player

file_operations.description: Create day-night cycle component that transitions lighting between day and night states. Update ambient light intensity and directional light color based on time. Display current time of day to player.
Create hook managing time progression state with configurable cycle duration. Return current time percentage and lighting parameters.
Integrate DayNightCycle component into 3D world to control lighting based on time state.

acceptanceCriteria: Weather changes with visual effects (rain particles, clouds)
Weather state affects gameplay mechanics
Weather transitions are smooth and natural

file_operations.description: Create weather system component rendering weather effects (clear, rain, storm) in 3D world. Use particle systems for rain effects. Fetch current weather state from backend getWeather method.
Create query hook that fetches weather state from backend getWeather method. Poll periodically for weather updates.
Integrate WeatherSystem component into 3D world to render current weather effects.

acceptanceCriteria: Player can attack enemies in real-time
Combat responds to player input with minimal delay
Health and damage calculations work correctly
Combat state is synchronized with backend

file_operations.description: Create real-time combat system handling player attacks, enemy AI, health tracking, and damage calculations. Implement keyboard/touch controls for movement and basic attacks with responsive input handling.
Create hook managing local combat state including player health, enemy health, active attacks, and combat phase. Synchronize critical combat events with backend.
Integrate CombatSystem into game world when player enters combat encounters.

acceptanceCriteria: Consecutive attacks build combo counter
Combo thresholds unlock special moves
Combo counter resets after combat pause
Visual feedback shows combo state

file_operations.description: Create combo counter UI component displaying current combo count with visual feedback for combo thresholds. Show special move availability.
Create hook managing combo counter state, tracking consecutive attacks, detecting combo thresholds, and handling combo reset timer.
Integrate combo system into combat, incrementing counter on attacks and triggering special moves at thresholds. Display ComboCounter component during combat.

requirements.summary: Create special ability system with cooldown timers
acceptanceCriteria: Each class has unique special abilities
Abilities have cooldown periods after use
Visual indicators show ability availability
Abilities execute correctly during combat

file_operations.description: Create ability bar UI displaying class-specific special abilities with cooldown indicators. Show visual feedback for ability availability and active cooldowns.
Create hook managing ability state including cooldown timers, ability activation, and availability checks based on character class.
Integrate ability system into combat allowing players to activate class-specific abilities. Display AbilityBar component in combat UI.

requirements.summary: Implement ultimate skill system with charge meter
acceptanceCriteria: Ultimate meter fills through combat actions
Ultimate skill can be activated when meter is full
Each class has unique ultimate ability
Visual effects distinguish ultimate from regular abilities

file_operations.description: Create ultimate meter UI component showing charge progress with visual effects. Display ultimate activation button when fully charged.
Create hook managing ultimate charge state, incrementing charge on combat actions, and handling ultimate activation. Call backend updateCharacterUltimate method when activating.
Integrate ultimate system into combat, charging meter on player actions and executing class-specific ultimate abilities. Display UltimateMeter component in combat UI.

acceptanceCriteria: Main quest line progresses through multiple chapters
Quest objectives are clearly displayed
Quest progress is tracked and persisted
Completing quests grants rewards

file_operations.description: Create quest log UI displaying active main quests with objectives, progress tracking, and rewards. Fetch main quests from backend getQuests method with isMain=true.
Create query hook fetching quests from backend getQuests method. Support filtering by main/side quests.
Create mutation hook calling backend completeQuest method with characterId and questId.
Create quests route rendering QuestLog component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add quests route to router configuration and include navigation link.

acceptanceCriteria: Side quests are discoverable in different locations
Side quests are independent from main storyline
Side quest completion grants rewards
Players can track multiple active side quests

file_operations.description: Create side quest panel displaying available and active side quests. Fetch side quests from backend getQuests method with isMain=false. Show quest discovery locations and rewards.
Integrate SideQuestPanel to display both main and side quests in tabbed interface.

acceptanceCriteria: Players can choose between multiple dialogue options
Choices alter subsequent story events
NPC attitudes change based on player choices
Choice consequences are persistent

file_operations.description: Create dialogue interface displaying NPC conversations with multiple choice options. Track player choices and display consequences. Store choice history in local state for branching dialogue paths.
Create hook managing dialogue state including current conversation, available choices, choice history, and NPC relationship changes.
Integrate DialogueSystem to trigger when player interacts with NPCs in the game world.

acceptanceCriteria: Players can invite others to form party
Party members appear in same combat instance
Boss encounters scale for multiple players
Rewards are distributed to all party members

file_operations.description: Create party formation UI allowing players to invite others and manage party members. Display party member list with character info.
Create hook managing party state including member list, invitations, and party composition.
Extend combat system to support multiple party members in boss encounters. Scale boss difficulty based on party size.
Create multiplayer route rendering PartySystem component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add multiplayer route to router configuration and include navigation link.

acceptanceCriteria: Players can create new guilds
Players can search and join existing guilds
Guild member roster is visible
Guild chat functionality works for all members

file_operations.description: Create guild management UI with guild creation form, guild browser, and member roster display. Call backend createGuild, joinGuild, and getAllGuilds methods.
Create mutation hook calling backend createGuild method with guild name.
Create mutation hook calling backend joinGuild method with guildId.
Create query hook fetching all guilds from backend getAllGuilds method.
Create guild chat component allowing guild members to communicate. Implement message history and real-time updates.
Create guilds route rendering GuildManager and GuildChat components. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add guilds route to router configuration and include navigation link.

requirements.summary: Implement player-to-player trading system within guilds
acceptanceCriteria: Guild members can initiate trades with each other
Trade interface shows items being exchanged
Both parties must confirm before trade completes
Trade history is logged

file_operations.description: Create trade interface for guild members showing items from both parties, confirmation requirements, and trade execution. Display trade history.
Create hook managing trade state including offered items, trade partner, confirmation status, and trade completion.
Integrate TradeInterface allowing guild members to initiate trades from member roster.

acceptanceCriteria: Guilds can declare war on other guilds
Guild war battleground exists with win conditions
Guild rankings update based on war outcomes
Winning guild receives rewards

file_operations.description: Create guild wars interface for declaring wars, viewing active wars, and accessing war battlegrounds. Display guild rankings and war results.
Create war battleground component rendering PvP combat arena for guild wars with win conditions and reward distribution.
Create hook managing guild war state including active wars, rankings, and battle results.
Create guild wars route rendering GuildWars component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated and in a guild. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add guild-wars route to router configuration.

acceptanceCriteria: Resource nodes spawn in appropriate environments
Players can interact with nodes to gather resources
Resources are added to player inventory
Resource quantities are tracked

file_operations.description: Create resource node component for 3D world representing gatherable materials (ore, herbs, wood) with interaction triggers.
Create hook managing player inventory state including resource quantities and item additions.
Spawn ResourceNode components in appropriate biome locations. Handle player interaction with nodes to gather resources.
Create inventory UI panel displaying collected resources and items with quantities.

acceptanceCriteria: Crafting interface displays available recipes
Players can select recipe and see required materials
Crafting consumes resources and produces items
Crafted items appear in player inventory

file_operations.description: Create crafting interface displaying recipes for weapons, armor, and potions. Show required materials and crafting button. Execute crafting by consuming resources and adding crafted items to inventory.
Create hook managing crafting state including available recipes, material requirements, and crafting execution.

Create crafting route rendering CraftingStation and InventoryPanel components. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add crafting route to router configuration and include navigation link.

acceptanceCriteria: Players can list items with set prices
Marketplace displays all active listings
Players can search and filter marketplace
Purchase transactions complete correctly

file_operations.description: Create marketplace UI displaying item listings with prices, search and filter functionality, and purchase interface. Call backend createTransaction method for purchases and fetch transactions using getUserTransactions method.
Create mutation hook calling backend createTransaction method with seller, item, and price parameters.
Create query hook fetching user transactions from backend getUserTransactions method.
Create marketplace route rendering Marketplace component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add marketplace route to router configuration and include navigation link.

requirements.summary: Build in-app store with secure purchase flow
acceptanceCriteria: Store displays available cosmetic items
Battle pass tiers and rewards are visible
Premium membership benefits are clearly shown
Purchase flow integrates with Internet Identity

file_operations.description: Create in-app store UI displaying cosmetic items, battle passes, and premium membership options with prices. Use the stripe component to support payment processing. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create payment setup component checking if Stripe is configured using backend isStripeConfigured method. If not configured, display admin panel for Stripe configuration using setStripeConfiguration method. Use the stripe component following its configuration requirements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create mutation hook for Stripe checkout session calling backend createCheckoutSession method with shopping items. Parse JSON response to get session with url field. Use the stripe component following its checkout session requirements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create payment success component displaying confirmation message and purchased items. Use the stripe component's success handling pattern. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create payment failure component displaying error message and retry options. Use the stripe component's failure handling pattern. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Create store route rendering GameStore and PaymentSetup components. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create payment success route rendering PaymentSuccess component as required by Stripe redirect flow. Use the stripe component's routing requirements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create payment failure route rendering PaymentFailure component as required by Stripe redirect flow. Use the stripe component's routing requirements. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add store, payment-success, and payment-failure routes to router configuration. Include store navigation link.

acceptanceCriteria: Events activate during specified time periods
Event-specific quests appear during active events
Event rewards are unique to that season
Event status is visible in UI

file_operations.description: Create event calendar UI displaying active and upcoming seasonal events with time periods. Show event-specific quests and exclusive rewards.
Create hook managing seasonal event state including active events, event schedules, and event-specific content availability.

Integrate DailyRewards component to display automatically on login if rewards are available.

Create challenges route rendering ChallengePanel component. Use the authorization component to ensure user is authenticated. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

acceptanceCriteria: UI components use consistent fantasy RPG aesthetic
Color scheme reflects magical and heroic themes
